page.title: 06PEOPLE AND BUILDINGS/4
page.content: (continued) Bosbury church does not have very many weddings it only has about 6 weddings a year.Where he was previously he would have 6 on Saturday alone _thats a lot.He only goes to Bosbury post office for stamps. He goes to Ledbury once a week for shopping and then he goes to Worcester once or twice a month for main shopping. MR. HONE - BOSBURY HOUSE FARMS Mr. Hone was interviewed on 3rd July. The thing that he had noticed changed in Bosbury was that everyone had a motorcar. He would like to see the Youth Club doing better. He joins in most of the organisations.Six people live in the house. The property is over 200 years old. They own 800 acres of land. They spend their freetime growing cherries, shooting
